TopicTitle: Guys! Look at the Steam Gift Card!

Articles.Content: So, I was chilling at Meijer (My-yur) looking at the gift cards and stuff when I came across the steam gift card and KSP is on It! That really surprised me, because despite how big the community is, not as many people that play KSP than a game like CSS or CoD. So yeah, something cool I saw at the store.![:P](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_tongue.gif)

hhciba ; ) but shhh don't tell xDr

**Edited <time datetime="2015-05-25T01:59:35Z" title="05/25/2015 01:59  AM" data-short="9 yr">May 25, 2015</time> by WinkAllKerb''**
Like a clear picture that wasn't blocked by words was on the left side of the card.
